casebody.data:
KEGLER BROWN HILL & RITTER CO., L.P.A., Appellant,
v.
Virginia N. BERNET and Charles Schwab Trust Company of Delaware, as Trustee of the James A. Bernet 8/9/01 Trust fbo Virginia N. Bernet, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-2747 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 15, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
